Title: gKodes.HexView a .net/mono Hex View Control in C#
Description: gKodes.HexView is an Custom control developed in C# for viewing content in Hexadecimal format as displayed by a hex editor. The control is compactable with both Microsoft .net and Mono Runtimes.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

gKodes.HexView is an Custom control developed in C# for viewing content in Hexadecimal format as displayed by a hex editor. The control is compactable with both Microsoft .net and Mono Runtimes.

Features

  • Allows selection of data
  • Highlight both Hex & Text view simultaneously
  • View offsets in hex or in decimal
  • Variable length of hex value 8, 16, 32 bytes
  • Automatic resize to match editor's view
